sections.heading: Short title. This Act may be cited as the the Pesticide Application on Rights-of-Way Notification Act.
sections.text: Short title. This Act may be cited as the the Pesticide Application on Rights-of-Way Notification Act.

sections.heading: Prior notification requirements for application of pesticides on rights-of-way.
sections.text: Prior notification requirements for application of pesticides on rights-of-way.

sections.heading: Administrative rules. This Act shall be administered and enforced by the Department
sections.text: The Department may adopt rules as necessary for the enforcement of this Act.
